long_description: Handmade from a repurposed (new) yoga mat and other materials, the OlovesM Diaper Tote Bag gives new parents an easy, colorful way to cart around baby essentials while being kind to Mother Nature. Diaper bag is fully lined and easily wipes clean; roomy main compartment zips closed so nothing falls out. Sturdy stroller straps let you attach the diaper bag to stroller handles and then tuck away when not in use. Two inner zippered pockets: 1 isolates damp items; 1 keeps wallet, keys and other items readily accessible. Four inside pockets hold bottles, wipes, pacifiers and toys; 6 exterior pockets stash easy-grab items. Yoga mat exterior wipes clean; tapestry design fabric on bag is from over-runs, seconds, ends of rolls, or USA made. Long shoulder straps are made from webbing left over when a sandal company went out of business. OlovesM Diaper Tote bags are handmade in the USA from new yoga mats that were overproduced or that studios and stores could not use.
short_description: Handmade from a repurposed (new) yoga mat and other materials, the OlovesM Diaper Tote Bag gives new parents an easy, colorful way to cart around baby essentials while being kind to Mother Nature.
